articles.description: Zee Studios International will re-release comedy film Good Newwz, starring Akshay Kumar, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Diljit Dosanjh and Kiara Advani, in Dubai on June 11.
articles.content: Good Newwz will hit screens in Dubai on June 11. (Photo: Zee Studios)After almost three months of no film releases due to the coronaviruspandemic, Dubai theaters are set to reopen this week. And, Goo… [+1419 chars]

articles.description: Yesteryear actor Mehmood once got upset with Amitabh Bachchan and spilled the beans about the same in an interview. Read on for further details.

articles.title: Monday Masala: Before Gulabo Sitabo, a look at Shoojit Sircar's ordinarily extraordinary films - India Today
articles.description: This Monday Masala, we look back at Shoojit Sircar's unique films and why they remain special to his fans till date.
articles.content: Love finds you in the most unpredictable circumstances, even in an ICU. Director Shoojit Sircar taught us that in 2015 with October. The filmmaker is, after all, known to evoke the deepest of emotion… [+4392 chars]
